title: Old Backup Directory Accumulation Without Cleanup Policy
description: Medium maintenance issue: Multiple old backup directories accumulated on droplet without cleanup policy - '/root/claude-backups' (29MB, dated July 11), '/root/n8n-backup-20250802' (116KB), and duplicate N8N security backups consuming 91MB+ total. Root cause: No backup retention policy implemented, allowing backups to accumulate indefinitely without lifecycle management. This causes unnecessary disk usage and backup confusion. Prevention: Establish backup retention policy with automatic cleanup of backups older than specified retention period. Implement backup lifecycle management procedures.

solution.description: Successfully resolved old backup directory accumulation issue. Removed old backup directories: '/root/claude-backups' (29MB), '/root/n8n-backup-20250802' (116KB), and older N8N security backup '/root/.n8n/security-backup-20250822-145219'. Preserved most recent N8N security backup for recovery purposes. Total space recovered: ~140MB. Essential backup files maintained while removing outdated duplicates. Established understanding of backup cleanup importance.
